1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Jeff, Angel, Stretch & Mother Love kick off the first season of The Daily Mix with a bang. They get right down to business talking about blow jobs, man girdles, and workplace romances. A tradition of the girls vs. the guys in a viral video showdown is established with YouTube videos about zombies (the guys' pick) and cats (the girls' pick). The guys visit Cold Stone Creamery in the first segment of "Dude Food" and special guest Jordan Stidham talks about his show "Ghost Catchers."

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Jeff, Angel, Stretch & Mother Love along with special guest, Dr. Belisa Vranich discuss plastic surgery specifically in regards to a case about a teenage girl. The group talks about a Visine poisoning story. Angel teases that it doesn't work, because Jeff is still in good health. Witness the nightmare child known as "Honey Boo Boo" in today's viral video from the guys. The ladies visit Red Brick Pizza in the first segment of "Chic Food." Healthy pizza? Who knew!

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Jeff, Angel, Stretch and guest host Hope Flood discuss cheating, junk food, internet scams, and Mitt Romney. The guys visit Bruxie for some waffle sandwiches in the Dude Food segment.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Jeff, Angel, Stretch and guest host Hope Flood discuss changes in radio & TV, technology, hacking your brain, racial misconceptions and more. The team also visits K1 Speedway for a go-kart racing adventure.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Jeff, Angel, and Stretch, along with guest, Dr Belisa, discuss Pat Robertson, Lidnsay Lohan, Courtney Stodden, and more.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Jeff, Angel, Stretch & guest host Tiffany Phillips, along with Dr. Belisa, talk about corporate fear. Jerry Jones raps. The guys tell us the annoying things women do. Angel talks about the LAPD & more.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Jeff, Angel, and Stretch discuss how Tom Cruise held auditions for a wife; Angel tells us the top 5 guy annoyances and gives us a healthy superfood tip; they also talk about Stodden and Playboy, and digital ownership rights.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Stretch tells us the top 5 free porn sites; Angel tells us the top 10 romantic things a guy can do; your hosts talk about Bob Barker getting dissed, a serial flasher, and more. Special guest Adam Miller inputs his legal perspective. Special guests Irene Diaz and Carolyn Cardoza perform some of their best songs for you.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Jeff, Angel, & Stretch with special guest Adam Miller discuss viagra, tattoos, top 5 guy annoyances, Lydnsey Lohan, and insta boobs.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Jeff, Angel, & Stretch discuss Obama, Taylor Townsend, Rihanna, Nic Cage and 8 things she hates about you, sleep deprivation, and stalkers.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Jeff, Angel, & Stretch talk with special guests Ramiro Ramirez and Fernando Flores about their experiences with ghosts in "Haunted Orange California." As always there is a viral video showdown and they also discuss bad moms, the remember ring, and more.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Jeff, Angel, & Stretch feature a clip of an overweight newscaster who received hate mail and stands up for herself on air. They also discuss Hulk Hogan, Stacy Dash, Olivia Wilde and cross over artists. In this episode the guys take a visit to the magician "Guccini" who provides wardrobe for them everyday on The Daily Mix.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: With the recent tragic news of Amanda Todd's suicide, bullying and teen depression is the topic of the day. Also on the agenda for discussion is the benefits and risks of getting pregnant over 40 (as Jeff tries to twist Angel's arm into getting pregnant again), the usual viral video showdown, and more!

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: The 'Bad Apple' award is given to today's worst teacher; guest Hope Flood and Angel visit a local wine bar where Angel gets to bottle her own bottle of wine; and in the viral video battle the guys bring Snoop Dog to the table against the girls' wedding mishaps video.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Jeff, Angel, & Stretch along with special guest Dr. Kim Kimpel talk about the latest news in the Amanda Todd story, how much is too much when it comes to helping your kids, city vs. country living, and Dr. Kimpel's area of specialty - relationships and marriage.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Jeff, Angel, & Stretch along with special guest, Loan Phan, from A Touch of Romance, discuss whether or not Santa's pipe smoking is a bad influence on kids. Stretch tells an inspiring high school football story. They talk about what they'd do if they had 20 million dollars, a strip club in the basement of a home, and guest Hope Flood is now drunk on wine in the continuation of the wine bar excursion!

imdb.plot outline: The Best Talk Show to hit the airwaves in decades. The Daily Mix is NOT your mother's talk show. Jeff, Angel and Stretch cover all the things you are talking about and all the things you should be talking about. Whether in the studio or out in the field this show is more than entertaining. Throw in special celebrity and musical guests and this show becomes a must see. You will soon have a favorite host and see a little of yourself in all of them.
imdb.title: The Daily Mix
plot: The Best Talk Show to hit the airwaves in decades. _The Daily Mix_ (qv) is NOT your mother's talk show. Jeff, Angel and Stretch cover all the things you are talking about and all the things you should be talking about. Whether in the studio or out in the field this show is more than entertaining. Throw in special celebrity and musical guests and this show becomes a must see. You will soon have a favorite host and see a little of yourself in all of them.::Angel Diane
